alert.note: Alert for Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 15 at 5:15PM CDT until April 15 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WEBSTER...WESTERN DOUGLAS AND EASTERN CHRISTIAN COUNTIES... At 515 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sparta, or 11 miles southeast of Ozark, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ava... Seymour... Sparta... Oldfield... Elkhead... Bruner... Keltner... Christian Center... Garrison... Rome... Chadwick... Goodhope... Dogwood... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
